gameDetails.name: Chicken vs Hotdog
gameDetails.description:
Okay, it’s time to settle this once and for all – who is top dog (or chicken)? Get ready to find out.

Split into teams, or go one-on-one, then grab your Sling’Em® and get ready to bid and flip your way to sweet-tastin’ victory.

Turn over a Challenge Card, then secretly bid high if you think you can nail it or bid low to avoid it. If both bids match, then it’s Flipperama time!

Every time you complete a challenge, you’ll get to turn over one of your Character Cards. The first player to turn over all six wins!
